text: Vincent Michael Rizzotto (September 9, 1931 â€“ January 17, 2021) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. Rizzotto was an auxiliary bishop of the Archdiocese of Galveston-Houston from 2001 to 2006. He was born in Houston, Texas. Rizzotto died on January 17, 2021 at the age of 89 in Houston. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Houston
title: Vincent M. Rizzotto
